note:
"But what if I...?" - OMFG, No!

Full Stack Spoilsport. Antifascist feminist pacifist. Neurospicy, genderspicy, harissa on two legs.

Feeling too many emotions. Thinking too many thoughts. Living too many memories. Cuddling too few people and cats.

Music. Fencing. Shitposting. Hacks of Poetry. Genderfuckery. 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈⚧️

Everything is political. Every person has a right to their life how they wish to live it.

Punch Nazis.

(The owl 🦉 is for Athene, the trident 🔱 for Vamakali.)
